comment.value: Authors: Cameron Clark, Robert Dugmore, Kian Frassek
This is an overview sheet showing how the sub-circuits interconnect
Interfaces with power, sensors, usb, user inputs and output
Details the interfacing between the microcontroller and the rest of the board
For connecting the micro USB to the batttery charger and data extraction from the EEPROM
